content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Coal Mine at position (41.0, -86.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (41.0, -86.0)
- Burner mining drill at position (43.0, -86.0)
- Wooden chest at position (41.5, -84.5)
- Wooden chest at position (43.5, -84.5)
- Burner inserter at position (42.5, -84.5)

#### Iron Ore Mine at position (4.0, -60.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (4.0, -60.0)
- Wooden chest at position (4.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at position (4.5, -56.5)

#### Iron Ore Mine at position (-17.0, -52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-17.0, -52.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-16.5, -50.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -51.0)
- Stone furnace at position (-13.0, -50.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-13.5, -51.5)
- Wooden chest at position (-13.5, -48.5)
- Wooden chest at position (-11.5, -48.5)

### ERROR TIPS

#### Errors when inserting into a full chest
- Ensure the chest has enough space before attempting to insert items. Check the inventory capacity and remove items if necessary.

#### Errors when mining with a full chest
- Empty the chest at the drop position to allow the mining drill to continue operating.

#### Errors when smelting without fuel
- Ensure the furnace has sufficient fuel before attempting to smelt items. Add coal or other fuel sources as needed.

#### Errors when accessing attributes on a string
- Verify the object type before accessing attributes. Ensure the object is of the expected type and has the required attributes.

### NAMESPACE

#### Utility Functions
- `extract_items(position: Position, item: str, amount: int) -> bool`: Extracts items from a chest or mining drill at the specified position. Success: Items are extracted and added to inventory. Failure: Position is invalid or entity does not contain the specified items.

#### Important Variables
- `inventory: dict`: Current inventory of the agent, containing items and their quantities.
- `entities: list`: List of entities on the map, including their positions and statuses.
